document.full_text: early comments online and in newspapers point to cautious american support for a limited role in bombing libyan air defenses but wariness over entangling the united states in an ill-defined military mission.
document.title: americans appear wary over u.s. role in libya
lines_and_colors: early comments online and in newspapers point to cautious american support for a limited role in bombing libyan air defenses but wariness over entangling the united states in an ill-defined military mission.
